channel.description: Recent content in R on STA304 Assignment

item.title: Analysis of COVID-19 source of infection
item.description: Abstract: We investigated the OpenToronto COVID-19 Cases in Toronto data. Performed data diagnostics, and results showed that the most common way cause people infected is close contact with a case in Toronto. These results are important because once we know the source of infection, we can then make move to protect people from infection. # Load packages library(opendatatoronto) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.
